PROGRAM SPECIFICATIONS

Mode Online Only

Video Issues?

  1. Refresh page multiple times
  2. Inspect browser console (Right-click â†’ Inspect â†’ Network/Console)
  3. Log out and log in again
  4. Try different browser
  5. Clear browsing data and cache
  6. Email: internship-support@vicharanashala.zohodesk.in (9 AM - 9 PM)

Progress Showing Less Than 100%?

  • Known dashboard-level technical issue
  • Team is working on it - will auto-fix
  • Try: Refresh browser OR Clear cache and re-login
  • No further action needed from you

ğŸ’¬ Zoho Cliq Channel

  1. Email invite â†’ Open
  2. Login with Google (same email as registration)
  3. #Channels â†’ Join

Canâ€™t Join?

  • Profile â†’ Admin Panel â†’ Policies â†’ Channel Collaboration

Canâ€™t Send Messages?

Profile Picture:

  1. Zoho Cliq â†’ Profile icon â†’ My Zoho Account
  2. Authorize with Google
  3. Settings â†’ Preferences â†’ Set visibility to â€œAnyoneâ€
  4. Return to Cliq â†’ Refresh â†’ Upload clear photo (face visible)

  • Check â€œProfile Picture Visibilityâ€ = â€œEveryoneâ€

SUPPORT PROTOCOL

ğŸ¯ 3-Step Process (Mandatory)

Step 1 (0-24 hrs):

  • Email: internship-support@vicharanashala.zohodesk.in
  • Response Time: Within 2 hours (9 AM - 9 PM)
  • Include: Clear subject, detailed description, screenshots/recordings, your registered email and name

Step 2 (24-48 hrs):

  • Subject: Attention Please â€“ Follow-up on Ticket #[Original Ticket Number]
  • Response: Mentors Team via voice call

Step 3 (48+ hrs):

  • Email: Program Sponsor
  • CC: Prof. Sudarshan Iyengar, Faculty reference, Department HOD, vled@iitrpr.ac.in
  • Include: Both ticket numbers, dates, issue summary, previous correspondence

Why This Process?

  • âœ… Transparency - All stakeholders informed
  • âœ… Accountability - Ensures timely resolution
  • âœ… Efficiency - Prevents issues from being overlooked

LEARNING CHECKLIST

Getting Started:

  • Receive and accept ViBe invite
  • Log in to ViBe successfully
  • Join Cliq channel
  • Set up Cliq profile picture
  • Verify same name/email across platforms

During Program:

  • Progress through ViBe modules at your pace
  • Engage with community on Cliq
  • Explore optional Case Studies if interested
  • Attend optional live sessions when available
  • Help peers when you can
  • Ask for help when stuck

Completion:

  • Complete all ViBe course modules (100%)
  • Optional: Submit Case Studies for extra learning
  • Check official communication for certification info

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS

Required:

  • Desktop or Laptop (mandatory)
  • Stable internet connection
  • Modern browser (Chrome/Edge/Firefox latest versions)
  • Google account (for ViBe and Cliq)
  • VS Code (recommended for case studies)

Not Supported:

  • âŒ Mobile phones
  • âŒ Tablets
  • âŒ iPad/Android tablets

System Recommendations:

  • Sequential video viewing (enforced by ViBe)
  • Allow camera/mic access if required
  • Good lighting and minimal noise for interactive sessions

MENTORSHIP & GUIDANCE

Instructor Interaction:

  • Course instructor may interact with participants based on project requirements

Mentors & Coordinators:

  • Engage via live sessions when scheduled
  • Available on Cliq forums for questions
  • Support team handles technical/administrative queries

Self-Guided Learning:

  • ViBe platform provides structured course content
  • Case Studies offer hands-on practice
  • Community support via Cliq channel
  • Breakout rooms during Zoom sessions (when available)
